      public void updateAspectRatio​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f aspectRatio, float headerHeight)
      Updates the aspect ratio to prevent artifacts when rescaling the window
      Parameters:
      aspectRatio - the new aspect ratio of the window compared to the original window size
      headerHeight - the height of the header(determines height of code window)
